blogPost.excerpt: Get more attention to your videos by adding headlines, captions, and call-to-action and increase your interaction on social media. Also, turn your video meetings into highlights – everything online in your browser.
blogPost.body: Get more attention to your videos by adding headlines, captions, and call-to-action and increase your interaction on social media. Also, turn your video meetings into highlights – everything online in your browser.
blogPost.title: Customize Video by Type Studio - Customize your video by adding text overlays online
blogPost.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMeré

localize.description: 通过添加标题、标题和行动呼吁，让您的视频获得更多关注，并增加您在社交媒体上的互动。此外，还可以将您的视频会议变成亮点 - 一切都在浏览器中在线。
localize.tagline: 通过在线添加文字覆盖来定制您的视频。

localize.description: 通過添加標題、標題和行動呼籲，讓您的視頻獲得更多關注，並增加您在社交媒體上的互動。此外，還可以將您的視頻會議變成亮點 - 一切都在瀏覽器中在線。
localize.tagline: 通過在線添加文字覆蓋來定製您的視頻。

previous.excerpt: InstaText is a user-friendly writing and editing tool that helps you improve your text so that you are understood and perceived as a professional. InstaText improves styling and word choice, corrects grammatical errors and enriches your content.
previous.title: InstaText - AI-based editing tool that helps you improve your text

localize.description: InstaText是一个用户友好的写作和编辑工具，它可以帮助您改进您的文本，以便您被理解并被视为专业。InstaText可以改善文体和选词，纠正语法错误，丰富您的内容。
localize.tagline: 基于人工智能的编辑工具，帮助你提高文字水平。

localize.description: InstaText是一個用戶友好的寫作和編輯工具，它可以幫助您改進您的文本，以便您被理解並被視爲專業。InstaText可以改善文體和選詞，糾正語法錯誤，豐富您的內容。
localize.tagline: 基於人工智能的編輯工具，幫助你提高文字水平。

next.excerpt: Community Weekly is a newsletter for creators that are seeking to make their content profitable. We offer our subscribers resources and playbooks to help them go from 0 to HERO.
next.title: Community Weekly - Learn to grow and monetize your community

localize.description: 社区周报》是为那些正在寻求让自己的内容盈利的创作者而设的通讯。我们为订阅者提供资源和游戏手册，帮助他们从0到HERO。
localize.tagline: 学会发展和货币化你的社区

localize.description: 社區週報》是爲那些正在尋求讓自己的內容盈利的創作者而設的通訊。我們爲訂閱者提供資源和遊戲手冊，幫助他們從0到HERO。
localize.tagline: 學會發展和貨幣化你的社區
